Posts.Content: I do know his Gleason scores were 7 and psa level was 4 but when checked closer to surgery it was 2. He has not gotten his post op papers other than it had moved to sv and it wasn't removed but he would start radiation in 4 months after he is healed.thanks
Posts.Title: Surgery complete and cancer had spread to seminal vesicle .

Posts.Content: My uncle recently had prostate removed and the cancer had surprisingly spread to the seminal vesicle but was not in the lymph nodes. Has anyone else had any experience was this? What steps were taken and what is likely outcome? Any information would be appreciated!
Posts.Title: Surgery complete and cancer had spread to seminal vesicle .
